title: AFC Ajax - Wikipedia
snippet: As of 1 July 2022, Alfred Schreuder succeeded Erik ten Hag, who left for Manchester United, as Ajax's coach. Most of the key players from previous seasons left during the summer transfer period, but there was also a lot of reinvestment. Ajax started the 2022/23 season relatively well with six ...

title: John Heitinga appointed head coach of Ajax
snippet: Heitinga is signing a contract with Ajax as head coach until June 30, 2027. Marcel Keizer will be his assistant and is signing a contract of the same duration. Date: 31.05.2025 · Photographer: AFC Ajax ·

title: r/soccer on Reddit: [VI] Fred Grim will be Ajax first team head coach until at least the winter break
snippet: Simonis next Ajax coach - about to get fired.

title: Ajax hires Liverpool assistant John Heitinga as new head coach | AP News
snippet: Ajax has hired John Heitinga as head coach to replace Francesco Farioli nearly two weeks after the Italian resigned following the team’s late-season collapse.

title: Denny Landzaat appointed assistant coach of Ajax
snippet: Denny Landzaat has been added to the first team's technical staff with immediate effect. The 49-year-old Amsterdam native appeared on the training pitch today in his new role as assistant coach to Fred Grim.
